results.title: Impact of porous microsponges in minimizing myotoxic side effects of simvastatin
results.text_hl: Impact of porous microsponges in minimizing @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@myotoxic@@@ side effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@

results.title: Relationship between simvastatin pharmacokinetics and muscle toxicity in male mice.
results.text_hl: At 25 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@myotoxicity@@@ is less accentuated than at 10 mg/kg, possibly due to induction of protective mechanisms.

citations.NLM: Bouitbir J, Sanvee GM, Panajatovic MV, Fehrenbach NB, Fréchard T, Manivannan M, Duthaler U, Krähenbühl S. Relationship between simvastatin pharmacokinetics and muscle toxicity in male mice. Food Chem Toxicol. 2025 Aug 5;205():115688. PMID: 40774408

results.title: Modulation of Phospholipid Bilayer Properties by Simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Unfortunately, some of the side effects associated with the intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and other lipophilic statins at higher doses include statin-associated @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@SAM@@@) and, in more severe cases, @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@kidney failure@@@.

results.title: PGC-1alpha plays a pivotal role in simvastatin-induced exercise impairment in mice.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ impairs skeletal muscle function, muscle oxidative metabolism and mitochondrial morphology preferentially in WT and KO @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, whereas OE @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ appear to be protected, suggesting a role of @GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_19017 @@@PGC-1alpha@@@ in preventing @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-associated @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@myotoxicity@@@.

citations.NLM: Panajatovic MV, Singh F, Roos NJ, Duthaler U, Handschin C, Krähenbühl S, Bouitbir J. PGC-1alpha plays a pivotal role in simvastatin-induced exercise impairment in mice. Acta Physiol (Oxf). 2020 Apr;228(4):e13402. PMID: 31605661

results.title: mTORC2 is an important target for simvastatin-associated toxicity in C2C12 cells and mouse skeletal muscle - Roles of Rap1 geranylgeranylation and mitochondrial dysfunction.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @GENE_CRTC2 @GENE_74343 @@@mTORC2@@@ inhibition is an important mechanism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@myotoxicity@@@.

results.title: Effect of SLCO1B1 T521C on Statin-Related Myotoxicity With Use of Lovastatin and Atorvastatin.
results.text_hl: To validate the drug response phenotype, we replicated the previously established association between @VARIANT_c.521T>C_SLCO1B1_human @VARIANT_tmVar:rs4149056;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:10599;RS#:4149056;CorrespondingSpecies:9606 @@@rs4149056@@@ genotype and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@myotoxicity@@@.

results.text_hl: The pathological CR rate was 6.25% (2 in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group and 1 in placebo group).

results.title: Correlation between single-nucleotide polymorphisms and statin-induced myopathy: a mixed-effects model meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Moreover, an increased risk of @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@SIM@@@ was predicted for carriers of the @VARIANT_c.521T>C_SLCO1B1_human @VARIANT_tmVar:rs4149056;VariantGroup:1;CorrespondingGene:10599;RS#:4149056;CorrespondingSpecies:9606 @@@rs4149056@@@ C allele among @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, whereas carriers of the @GENE_GATM @GENE_2628 @@@GATM@@@ @VARIANT_rs9806699 @VARIANT_tmVar:rs9806699;VariantGroup:0;RS#:9806699 @@@rs9806699@@@ A allele among @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had a lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@SIM@@@.

results.title: Lysophosphatidic Acid Inhibits Simvastatin-Induced Myocytoxicity by Activating LPA Receptor/PKC Pathway
results.text_hl: Therefore, @CHEMICAL_lysophosphatidic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032881 @@@LPA@@@ might have potential as a bioactive molecule to protect muscles against @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Myotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@myotoxicity@@@.
